name: Devour Earth
description:
Play as a hungry, slippery alien, looking to absorb all the Earth's nutrients and evolve!

Gain new traits as you eat more and mess around on the humans planet!

(Play in full screen mode!  If you want to play with a controller, download it and it'll work. As WebGL doesn't seem to do the menu properly, make sure to click with your mouse instead on the "continue" text at the bottom of the screen)

Made for the Xanderjam 3 Game Jam in a few days!

Made by Isaac Yianni (ICY GAMES)

Music by Isaac Yianni, SFX from Zapsplat.com, 2d art from Isaac Yianni, 3d assets from Polyperfect, and Synty Studios
